long_description: Suited to aggressive mountain biking on rough trails, the Ergon GS1 Bike Grips offer palm support and easy adjustment in a lightweight, compact package. The Ergon GS1 Bike Grips feature a broad platform for palms to rest on, enhancing comfort and efficiency. Integrated antislip rubber inserts provide excellent grip in all conditions; inserts also help damp vibration.
short_description: Suited to aggressive mountain biking on rough trails, the Ergon GS1 Bike Grips offer palm support and easy adjustment in a lightweight, compact package.
